Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Janice L. Hulet
Reviews.Content: I love my phone. I was a little hesitate to get a Windows based phone in the beginning. I took the big step. I really like the Windows based system. I like the look of the screen, the tiles, the ease of going from one application to another.I would not go back to an Android phone.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Janice L. Hulet
Reviews.Content: I was a little hesitant to move from an Android phone.  I am glad i did.  Wonderful phone - very easy to use.  Great camera....why did I wait so long?Loved it so much, I purchased one for my daughter a week later.

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: Marie Heilman
Reviews.Content: This simple light little phone had so great screen, it's quick to respond and easy to learn to use. It's just like a mini Windows computer but better. Everything right at your fingers.

Reviews.Title: Excellent phone in Windows 8 Space
Reviews.Author: rpv
Reviews.Content: HTC 8X is definitely a incredible design and ergonomic. Windows 8 apps are a welcome change from iOS. Among the three ecosystems, I prefer Android, Windows 8, and iOS in that order. I got access to few Windows 8 phones to review. I will try to review them, but since I have not used for a period longer than a month I am not reviewing for reliability. 4.3" Super LCD 2, 720x1280 resolution, 342 ppi, Corning Gorilla Glass 2. Glass 2 is overlooked. Glass 3 is in the making and supposed to be even better. Stating following because this is highly underrated in reviews. From Corning's Gorilla Glass specs; WHAT MAKES GORILLA GLASS SO DAMAGE RESISTANT? The unique composition of Gorilla Glass allows for a deep layer of high compressive stress (created through an ion-exchange process). This compression acts as a sort of "armor," making the glass exceptionally tough and damage resistant. Ion exchange is a chemical strengthening process where large ions are "stuffed" into the glass surface, creating a state of compression. Gorilla Glass is specially designed to maximize this behavior.1.5 GHz dual-core Qualcomm Krait processor, 16 GB internal flash, 1 GB RAM NO microSD slot! Battery is 1800 mAh Li-ion battery. Compared to a high end Android Galaxy Note II, which has a battery of 3100 mAh Battery. Battery is also not removable. __Not having a storage expansion slot is a bummer for lot of people! Not being able to remove battery is a double bummer.__ 8 MP camera is awesome, and HD videos were fantastic. For me, storage expansion and removal of battery is very important, so I was disappointed. This is the downside the unibody design. This is the reason for me giving a 4 star review.I have used in the past extensively HTC Titan I and II which is pre Windows 8 (7.5) and I was surprised it has become more buttery smooth now. Apps are very smooth on 8X even compared to Nokia Lumia series. Apps are limited in Windows 8 marketplace. Yes, we have heard this a gazillion times. I tried with Navigon which turned out to be great in giving voice directions.Engadget wrote after the release: "Yes, the 8X is a fantastic ambassador to Windows Phone 8, but after using it for several days, we're longing for a similar phone from HTC running Android -- at least until a stronger app ecosystem develops for Microsoft's latest mobile OS" This is a chicken and egg situation. Unless more phones are sold, developers don't have incentives to write apps. Apps are less now, because people are not buying in big droves. Windows Phone is now (early-mid 2013) the third-leading mobile phone platform, more than tripling its market share year-over-year. One recent report I read Android and iOS are ahead in games with 162.1 and 37.4 million shipments in 1Q13 and Windows phone came in 7 million. This is more than double from previous year. I really hope for Windows 8 platform to surge ahead because having a 3 way competition with iOS and Android is good for the ecosystem.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Matthew Kirby
Reviews.Content: Best phone I ever had, will no longer go back to android or ios. Microsoft windows phone is the new future. Camera is excellent and the battery is very good. With windows 8 on this, it doesn't lag one bit.

Reviews.Title: LOVE HATE MY HTC 8X
Reviews.Author: Cynthia guerrero
Reviews.Content: The phone is beautiful, I got the blue and red versions of it. So far no complaints with the phone, its super fast, camera quality is great, it is super thin though, which is not a bad thing but I feel like its so fragile it might break if I drop it. It came in its retail packing, along with a verizon sim card, manuals, some htc stickers etc. If your thinking of buying this phone, buy it from USA-Tel they offer fast shipping, and the packaging is the best, they sent my phone inside two boxes haha, ensuring my phone get to me in good conditions and protecting it as well.3/9/14 ALRIGHT SO I ORIGINALLY GAVE THIS 5 STARS BUT CHANGED IT TO 3 BECAUSE, THE PHONE WONT SEND MESSAGES. I CAN RECEIVE THEM AND TEXT BACK WITHOUT A "CAN'T SEND MESSAGE TRY AGAIN", APPARENTLY MY TEXTS AREN'T RECEIVED, AT FIRST I THOUGHT MAYBE ITS THEIR PHONE OR MY SIM CARD. I PUT THE SIM CARD IN A DIFFERENT PHONE AND WORKED FINE. ALSO HAVING SOME TROUBLE WITH THE MMS SETTINGS.

Reviews.Title: Heavily underrated phone
Reviews.Author: J M Rossy
Reviews.Content: Have had this phone for a week and truly love it.Pros: Ultra-lightweight. Nice screen. Sleek design. Great audio.Cons: Windows phone 8 still has some progress to make in having the phone good-to-go out of the box (there's a lot of app downloading and account syncing the first few days).

Reviews.Title: Phone Works but Item not as described
Reviews.Author: Jayamohan Krishnasamy
Reviews.Content: Description stated - 'brand New in original retail box, Phone has Original plastic screen with all accessories have original packaging'. The phone I received was not in retail package. It was a generic htc package and the phone did not even have the plastic wrap. There was a sticker in the back of the phone. NB 08/13. Research on the internet comes up as New Breed Refurbished Phone inspected on 08/13. There is no warranty information nor user manual. I opted to buy this phone as the order was fulfilled by Amazon. The phone did not have any visible damage and so far in the past 4 days I did not have issues and the windows update went well. This is why I'm keeping this phone. There is always a disappointment when you receive the product not per the description. So buyers keep this in mind while ordering. You can easily find factory refurb models else where for around 175 or less

Reviews.Title: Stopped functioning in 4 months! Check if your seller is an authorized retailer
Reviews.Author: S. Wen "sunnysmom"
Reviews.Content: I bought my HTC 8x new from a retail seller on Amazon. It was new and unopened. However, after 4 months, the three buttons on the bottom stopped functioning. I have never dropped it and always take great care of it. I thought HTC has good quality, but this happened within 4 months! So I sent it back to HTC and provided all receipts to proof that I only had this for 4 months, HTC still wants to charge me since HTC does not cover phones not purchased from Amazon. Be aware of it! It may stop function in a short time, and if you are going to buy it from any other sellers , check with them first to see if your phone is covered with warrantee.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: I'm not the biggest fan of android software, but I've liked the look of windows phones for awhile. Decided to take a gamble and find an affordable used phone through amazon and hope for the best. I absolutely love my phone! The company I got it from shipped it very quickly, and I actually got in the mail before the projected arrival date. The phone was in exactly the condition it appeared to be in the picture and I have had absolutely no problems with it. I'm really loving the windows format as well :)

Reviews.Title: Good Windows OS, but poor build quality from HTC
Reviews.Author: Sean Roney
Reviews.Content: After a year and 4 months of owning this phone, I've encountered a slew of problems during my ownership period.  From sim card read error messages, to text not going through, and the most recent issue of the phone randomly shutting down.All of my issues have been hardware based and I would recommend a Nokia if you want a Windows phone.

Reviews.Title: Features
Reviews.Author: kouao
Reviews.Content: This product was working well until the next month i bought it. the screen becomes dark when I am on call

Reviews.Title: good gift
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Babin
Reviews.Content: Excellent phone. I gave it to my son for graduation. He was extremely pleased with his graduation gift. Thank you

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Matthew
Reviews.Content: This phone in general is too much of a downgrade. I had trouble accessing my phone over a due amount of time, because the power button malfunctioned. Also, you don't get all the cool feature of a free GPS.

Reviews.Title: Windows Phone 8X
Reviews.Author: Robin F.
Reviews.Content: I took this phone to the Verizon Store and already have an account.  I was unable to get my email accounts added to the phone.  The phone looks great; however, it is difficult to understand, and I have Windows 8.1 on a laptop.  The phone was extremely hot as I charged it.  I would not recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Nailed it
Reviews.Author: Robert snyder
Reviews.Content: Great phone, was exactly as described in box new unlocked. Only thing is lock button can be hard to find

Reviews.Title: not what i expected
Reviews.Author: Widhoes
Reviews.Content: I hate buying phones online because you can't be too sure of what you're going to get. I bought the phone with high hopes because my iPhone was taking a crap. When I ordered this phone, I was expecting to get a package in the mail containing a brand new, in the box phone ready to be activated with the books that would normally come with it. But that's not what I got. The phone came wrapped in a plastic bag placed inside a plastic container containing simply just the phone, a charger, and a sticker with the order number and such on it. I was very disappointed. But that's not the only thing that upset me. When it came time to activate the phone, I was on the phone with Verizon for an hour and 19 minutes trying to activate it. The Verizon representative told me that the phone was not registered with Verizon. I was furious. We did however get it registered and activated and I've been using it for about a week. I like the phone itself overall but this specific phone has glitches when I'm in a call. It will randomly end calls, or when I'm in a call the screen won't shut off like its supposed to when I hold it to my ear, causing me to press buttons with my face. I could ramble on and on about the phone  but I'm going to leave it at that and just say that I would not recommend anybody to buy this specific phone from this specific seller.

Reviews.Title: HORRIBLE
Reviews.Author: T Gilham
Reviews.Content: Not only did i have to wait a long time for the product it has already malfunctioned. Out of no where the screen stopped working ... I really want my money back but luckily i can still talk on it, at least.

Reviews.Title: miss apps
Reviews.Author: Terri Silsby
Reviews.Content: I like camera. I am a bit disappointed because, I am not be able to get most of  apps that I had on my old phone because they don't have Windows versions.

Reviews.Title: Yay
Reviews.Author: Amber
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for a while and I don't know how I lived before without it! this is an amazing phone!
